text: QUERY PLAN FRAGMENTS Approach #1: Physical Operators — Generate a single query plan and then break it up into partition-specific fragments. — Most systems implement this approach. Approach #2: SQL — Rewrite original query into partition-specific queries. — Allows for local optimization at each node. — MemSQL is the only system that I know that does this. 3 ECMU-DB S IM » PI % 5846/125:14 [cc I « 266 i PE e 24 - Distributed OLAP Databases (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
